scripts.int: export INFLUXDB_HOST="influxdb-host" && export INFLUXDB_PORT="8086" && export INGEST_PATH="js/integration/pp.csv" && jest js/int
scripts.int:mark: export INFLUXDB_HOST="influxdb.invalid" && export INFLUXDB_PORT="80" && export INGEST_PATH="js/integration/pp.csv" && jest js/int
scripts.int:james: export INFLUXDB_HOST="172.17.0.2" && export INFLUXDB_PORT="8086" && export INGEST_PATH="js/integration/pp.csv" && jest js/int
scripts.test:watch: export INFLUXDB_HOST="172.17.0.2" export INFLUXDB_PORT="8086" && export INGEST_PATH="js/integration/pp.csv" && jest --watchAll
scripts.job:list: export INFLUXDB_HOST="172.17.0.2" && export INFLUXDB_PORT="8086" && export INGEST_PATH="js/integration/pp.csv" && babel-node ./js/app/job.list/index.js
scripts.rxjs: export INFLUXDB_HOST="172.17.0.2" && export INFLUXDB_PORT="8086" && export INGEST_PATH="js/integration/pp.csv" && babel-node ./js/app/observale
